entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
